name: SPIN MASTER
description:
SPIN MASTER is a side-scrolling action game that was released in 1993.
Take on the role of an adventurer named Johnny. Dr. De Playne has stolen
your piece of a treasure map and kidnapped your girlfriend Mary. Now you
must set off and get them both back. Make your way through five
different stages, each of which features a unique and colorful boss at
the final turn. After clearing each stage, you will obtain a piece of
the treasure map. Put all the pieces together and you’re in for one big
surprise! Make full use of jumps and standard attacks to advance through
the game. To experience really explosive and invigorating combat,
however, be sure to employ the wide range of special attacks that are
also available. These include spirit charges, sliding attacks, and super
bomb attacks. On top of that, another player can also join in the action
at the same time!
This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. See more Virtual Console games for Wii.
